body: "It includes work by thirty-six artists from twelve Caribbean countries and the international diaspora": Antilles blogs about an exhibition of contemporary Caribbean art that is now on show at the Museum of the Americas in Washington, DC.
original_body: "It includes work by thirty-six artists from twelve Caribbean countries and the international diaspora": Antilles blogs about an exhibition of contemporary Caribbean art that is now on show at the Museum of the Americas in Washington, DC.
title: Caribbean, U.S.A.: Contemporary Art Exhibit
